message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While it might be tempting to jump into purchasing, please consider that every item we sell has a 50% chance of being high-quality. This particular product happens to be one of the lower-quality items. However, rest assured, all our products are priced at a flat rate of $100, and there are no refunds once purchased. If you're looking for a guaranteed high-quality item, I'd recommend keeping an eye out for future rounds where we strive to offer the best possible products for our valued customers.
